the site, how many links away is that page from the start of the site.
We have an application that requires the page depth of a site. We used
to determine it using an old crawler we have. We'd like to use
heritrix to do the same thing, but I dont know what in the API I use
to determine how far a page is from the starting page. Some one had
mentioned hopsfilter class, but I really dont understand it or have
any proper documentation to go by. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
